pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Yuan2 zi3 neng2 Ji1 gou4

definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)

sentences.english: Yukiya Amano, the International Atomic Energy Agency's director general, said the situation was "very serious".
sentences.chinese: 國際原子能機構總幹事天野之彌說情況“非常緊急”。

sentences.english: Tehran insists the agency’s allegations are fabricated.
sentences.chinese: 德黑蘭堅持表示國際原子能機構的指控純屬捏造。

sentences.english: The International Atomic Energy Agency described an accident ranked 7 as a major one.
sentences.chinese: 國際原子能機構將七級描述爲特大事故。
